column5: April 13, 14 ,15  12 page flyer...All in stock rods and reels UP TO 50% off. Most look like about 25 to 33% in the flyer.  Best deals I saw was the Lowrance 102C fish finder for $499 (save $200)..don't know pricing elsewhere though to compare.  Canon Mini Troll downrigger 1/2 price $59.99  Lots of you guys talking about the Shimano Corvalus Bait Caster. It's on for $89.99 (save $20), available in two sizes it says.  Wetskins Deluxe Mens and Ladies Rainsuits 1/2 Price @ $49.99
Those are good prices, Wayne. Thanks for the heads up.

Just checked and they've updated their website since last year and now have their flyers on line...  http://www.tromblystacklebox.com/page/pdf_catalogue.html  I have absolutely no connection to the store btw....bought one rod and reel there in my life and a transducer for my portable Humminbird.
Yep that Mini Troll deal is the best price I've seen in a long time.
Thats what they all say.  Thanks for the link.
Some great deals. Might have to make the drive over on the weekend for a look.  Thanks Wayne
There go the piano lessons.  Thanks!  Love deeply, Joey
I always stop there for the Perch Festivle and spend a few bucks  Nice store, good to have competition here and there.. keep everyone honest
They'll have the manufacturer reps there too which I've noted in the past are pretty good at fielding questions about their products. Kerry
